kw.name: Get IP Address From Server
Execute Command
kw.msg: Executing command 'hostname -I | awk '{print $1}' || ip addr show | grep -oP '(?<=inet\s)\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+''.
kw.arg: hostname -I | awk '{print $1}' || ip addr show | grep -oP '(?<=inet\\s)\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+'
kw.doc: Executes ``command`` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.

kw.name: Strip String
kw.doc: Remove leading and/or trailing whitespaces from the given string.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.arg: ✅ IP address validation: PASSED - EDS matches Server
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.msg: ✅ Completed: Critical - IP Address Validation (FAIL) at 2025-10-10 19:31:57
